page.title: 06THE SELSEY LIFEBOAT PART 1
page.content: The first Lifeboat came here in 1861,it was called{"The Friend". Since then there have been seven Lifeboats.The one at the moment,the 8th,is named{"The City of London".}It is called out about 12 times a year and so far all the Selsey Lifeboats have saved 663 lives. Every year there is a{Lifeboat day}which includes a rescue and the helicopter comes as well as the Lifeboat.The{Lifeboat {Station}we have,is not the original one.That was washed away by the sea so they had to build another one."The City of London" is 47 feet long and is powered by two general motors each with 425 horse power.It runs on diesel and at top speed can go up to 20 knots. It uses 38 gallons an hour.The Coxswain is Mr.Mike Grant, Mr.Woodland is 2nd Coxswain and Mr.Wood is the mechanic.
